src_original: tatra kutsitāc chalitam iti kuśalam ,  gatam ity arthaḥ /
kuśeti vā prajñāparyāyaḥ /  lā ādāne /  prajñāparigṛhītāḥ prajñāparigrāhakā vā kuśalāḥ /
tgt_original: 或復善者名慧攝受，謂若諸法慧所攝受或攝受慧，皆名為善。

src_original: kutsitena vākāreṇa śerata iti kuśāḥ ,  chedakā vedhakāś ceti /  lā ādāne /  yaś chedanavedhanaparihāreṇa kuśān ādatte ,  sa kuśala ity ucyate /  evam anyo 'pi yasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ praśaṃsām arhati ,  sa kuśalas tatrocyate /
tgt_original: 或復善者是吉祥義，能招嘉瑞，如吉祥草。

src_original: kuśalākuśalabhāvenāvyākaraṇād avyākṛtāḥ /  daśa trividhā iti -- kuśalā apy akuśalā apy avyākṛtā api /  te tu na vijñāyanta aṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ katame daśety āha -- saptacittadhātavor rūpaśabdadharmadhātavaś ceti /  atra cittadhātūnāṃ samprayogataḥ kuśalākuśalatvam ,  na svataḥ ,
tgt_original: 色聲二界，善心等起即名為善，惡心等起名為不善，餘是無記。

src_original: tatra sapta cittadhātavo 'lobhādveṣāmohasamprayuktāḥ kuśalāḥ /  lobhadveṣamohasamprayuktā akuśalāḥ /  anya avyākṛtāḥ /
tgt_original: 其七心界，若無貪等相應名善，貪等相應名為不善，餘名無記。

src_original: rūpaśabdadhātū kuśalākuśalacittasamutthāpitau kuśalākuśalau kāyavāgvijñaptisaṅgṛhītau /  ato 'nyāv avyākṛtau /  dharmadhātur alobhādisvabhāvasamprayuktasamutthaḥ pratisaṅkhyānirodhas tathatā ca kuśalaḥ /  lobhādisvabhāvasamprayuktasamuttho 'kuśalaḥ /
tgt_original: 法界所攝品類眾多，無貪等性相應等記擇滅名善，若貪等性相應等起名為不善，餘名無記。
